abstract: General Electric is shifting the strategy in its $17 billion-a-year health equipment and technology business, seeking to broaden its reach with more lower-cost products.
snippet: General Electric is shifting the strategy in its $17 billion-a-year health equipment and technology business, seeking to broaden its reach with more lower-cost products.
lead_paragraph: General Electric is shifting the strategy in its $17 billion-a-year health equipment and technology business, seeking to broaden its reach with more lower-cost products.

headline.main: In Strategy Shift, G.E. Plans Lower-Cost Health Products
headline.print_headline: In Strategy Shift, G.E. Plans Lower-Cost Health Products
